REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f2346 reute r f BC-BFIM-SOVAC-OFFERS-BON 04-09 0069

TEXT.TITLE: BFIM-SOVAC OFFERS BOND REDEMPTION
TEXT.BODY: Banque de Financement Immobilier SOVAC, BFIM-SOVAC, launched an offer to repurchase its 14.30 pct 1980 bond issue at a price of 2,180 francs per bond, a Paris Bourse statement said. The repurchase offer, managed by Lazard Freres et Cie, opens April 10 and closes April 27. The 140 mln franc issue comprised 70,000 bonds of 2,000 franc nominal value each. Reuter
